item.title: Trackmania
item.description: For those who don’t know, the season 2023 of the Trackmania Grand League(TMGL for short) will start tommorow. Don’t miss it. For the sleepy head at the bakc of the classroom, i will resume what it is. The tmgl is a trackmania tournament where 8 teams of 2 players compete. Those player comes from around the world but, this year, 31 % of players are french. The canadian player CarlJr will be present, if you don’t know him, he is arguably the best player of the world, he is the magnus karlsen or the michael jordan of trackamania, he already won 6 world champion title.

item.title: Come is the great lord
item.description: 25565 is a fantastic cult that worship the one and only lord COME
